BeamBackgroundStudy.desc: Flag to use additional sensitive-detector object to record beam-background hits

Rotation.desc: Rotation about z axis of the BKLM with respect to the Detector

OffsetZ.desc: Offset of the BKLM along z with respect to the IP

Phi.desc: Starting azimuthal angle of the BKLM polygon

HasRPCs.desc: Flag to construct layer with RPCs (1) or scintillators (0)

ScintEnvelopeOffsetSign.desc: Shift scint envelope to -y for MPPCs at +y (i.e., on left)

HasRPCs.desc: Flag to construct layer with RPCs (1) or scintillators (0)

ScintEnvelopeOffsetSign.desc: Shift scint envelope to +y for MPPCs at -y (i.e., on right)

HasRPCs.desc: Flag to construct layer with RPCs (1) or scintillators (0)
